quiz.question: yank ____
quiz.explanation: 猛拉, 猛拉绳索. He had to yank the cord hard to start the lawnmower engine. 他不得不用力猛拉绳索来启动割草机引擎。

quiz.question: dink ____
quiz.explanation: 轻击, 轻击球. The tennis player executed a perfect dink shot over the net. 这位网球运动员完美地执行了一记过网的轻击球。

quiz.question: clink _______
quiz.explanation: 碰杯, 碰杯. The guests would clink their glasses together in a toast. 客人们会碰杯祝酒。

quiz.question: slink ____
quiz.explanation: 偷偷溜走, 偷偷溜走. The guilty dog would slink away after being scolded. 犯错的狗在被责骂后会偷偷溜走。

quiz.question: ___ stink
quiz.explanation: 恶臭, 难闻的恶臭. A bad stink came from the garbage that hadn't been collected. 未被收集的垃圾散发出难闻的恶臭。

quiz.question: hoodwink ______
quiz.explanation: 欺骗, 欺骗人们. The con artist managed to hoodwink people into investing in his fake company. 骗子成功欺骗人们投资他的假公司。

quiz.question: dunk ____
quiz.explanation: 扣篮, 扣篮球. The basketball star leaped high to dunk the ball through the hoop. 篮球明星跳得很高,将球扣进篮筐。

quiz.question: ____ thunk
quiz.explanation: 重击声, 响亮的重击声. A loud thunk echoed as the heavy book hit the floor. 厚重的书落地时发出响亮的重击声回荡着。

quiz.question: ______ clunk
quiz.explanation: 沉闷的撞击声, 引擎沉闷的撞击声. The strange engine clunk indicated a mechanical problem. 奇怪的引擎沉闷撞击声表明有机械问题。

quiz.question: plunk ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 砰地放下, 砰地放下钱. He would plunk down money on the counter for his purchases. 他会把钱砰地放下在柜台上购物。

quiz.question: ___ amok
quiz.explanation: 发狂, 发狂乱跑. The escaped animals began to run amok through the streets. 逃跑的动物开始在街道上发狂乱跑。

quiz.question: __ tenterhooks
quiz.explanation: 焦虑不安, 处于焦虑不安. She was on tenterhooks waiting for the exam results. 她在焦虑不安地等待考试结果。

quiz.question: _____ nook
quiz.explanation: 角落, 安静的角落. She found a quiet nook in the library to read her book. 她在图书馆找到了一个安静的角落读书。

quiz.question: crook ____
quiz.explanation: 弯曲, 弯曲的鼻子. The boxer had a distinctive crooked nose from past fights. 这位拳击手因过去的比赛而有一个独特的弯曲鼻子。

quiz.question: embark __ _______
quiz.explanation: 开始, 开始旅程. The explorers prepared to embark on their dangerous journey. 探险家们准备开始他们危险的旅程。

quiz.question: disembark __________
quiz.explanation: 下船, 下船乘客. The crew helped disembark passengers after the cruise ended. 游轮结束后,船员帮助乘客下船。

quiz.question: lark _____
quiz.explanation: 嬉戏, 四处嬉戏. Children would lark about in the playground during recess. 孩子们会在课间休息时在操场上四处嬉戏。

quiz.question: ____ pockmark
quiz.explanation: 痘疤, 脸上痘疤. The disease left permanent pockmarks on his face. 这种疾病在他脸上留下了永久的痘疤。

quiz.question: _____ berk
quiz.explanation: 笨蛋, 愚蠢的笨蛋. The silly berk forgot to lock the door before leaving. 这个愚蠢的笨蛋离开前忘了锁门。

quiz.question: __ berserk
quiz.explanation: 发狂, 发狂. The normally calm man would go berserk when provoked. 这个通常很冷静的人被激怒时会发狂。

quiz.question: irk _______
quiz.explanation: 使烦恼, 使某人烦恼. His constant complaining would irk everyone in the office. 他不断的抱怨会使办公室里的每个人烦恼。

quiz.question: smirk ____
quiz.explanation: 得意的笑, 得意的笑脸. He wore an annoying smirk on his face after winning the bet. 赢得赌注后,他脸上露出令人讨厌的得意笑容。

quiz.question: patchwork _____
quiz.explanation: 拼布, 拼布被子. Grandmother made a beautiful patchwork quilt from old fabrics. 祖母用旧布料做了一床漂亮的拼布被子。

quiz.question: ____ handiwork
quiz.explanation: 手工, 精美的手工. The intricate carving was an example of fine handiwork. 这个复杂的雕刻是精美手工的例子。

quiz.question: wickerwork _____
quiz.explanation: 柳条编织, 柳条编织椅. The garden featured comfortable wickerwork chairs for outdoor seating. 花园里有舒适的柳条编织椅供户外就座。

quiz.question: ____ guesswork
quiz.explanation: 猜测, 胡乱的猜测. Without data, the analysis was based on wild guesswork. 没有数据,分析基于胡乱的猜测。

quiz.question: lurk __ ____
quiz.explanation: 潜伏, 在黑暗中潜伏. Dangerous predators would lurk in the dark waiting for prey. 危险的捕食者会在黑暗中潜伏等待猎物。

quiz.question: bask __ ___
quiz.explanation: 晒太阳, 在阳光下晒太阳. Seals would bask in the sun on the warm rocks. 海豹会在温暖的岩石上晒太阳。

quiz.question: ____ flask
quiz.explanation: 烧瓶, 酒瓶. The traveler carried a wine flask for the long journey. 旅行者为长途旅行携带了一个酒瓶。

quiz.question: hipflask ______
quiz.explanation: 扁酒瓶, 扁酒瓶口袋. He kept a silver hipflask in his jacket pocket. 他在夹克口袋里放着一个银色的扁酒瓶。

quiz.question: whisk ____
quiz.explanation: 搅拌, 搅拌鸡蛋. The chef would whisk the eggs vigorously for the omelet. 厨师会用力搅拌鸡蛋做煎蛋卷。

quiz.question: ________ basilisk
quiz.explanation: 蛇怪, 神话中的蛇怪. Ancient legends told of a mythical basilisk whose gaze could kill. 古代传说讲述了一只目光能杀人的神话蛇怪。

quiz.question: brisk ____
quiz.explanation: 轻快的, 轻快的散步. She took a brisk walk every morning to stay healthy. 她每天早上进行轻快的散步以保持健康。

quiz.question: frisk _______
quiz.explanation: 搜身, 搜身嫌疑人. Security officers would frisk every suspect for weapons. 保安人员会对每个嫌疑人搜身寻找武器。

quiz.question: gawk __
quiz.explanation: 呆呆地看, 呆呆地看. Tourists would gawk at the famous landmarks in amazement. 游客们会呆呆地看着著名地标,感到惊讶。

quiz.question: ____ squawk
quiz.explanation: 尖叫, 鸟尖叫. The startled bird let out a loud squawk before flying away. 受惊的鸟在飞走前发出响亮的尖叫。

quiz.question: comical _____
quiz.explanation: 滑稽的, 滑稽的场景. The movie featured a comical scene that made everyone laugh. 这部电影有一个让每个人都笑的滑稽场景。

quiz.question: pyrotechnical _______
quiz.explanation: 烟火的, 烟火表演. The celebration concluded with a spectacular pyrotechnical display. 庆祝活动以壮观的烟火表演结束。

quiz.question: cylindrical _____
quiz.explanation: 圆柱形的, 圆柱形状. The container had a cylindrical shape perfect for storing rolled documents. 这个容器有一个完美的圆柱形状,适合存放卷起的文件。

quiz.question: hysterical ________
quiz.explanation: 歇斯底里的, 歇斯底里的笑声. The comedian's jokes provoked hysterical laughter from the audience. 这位喜剧演员的笑话引发了观众歇斯底里的笑声。

quiz.question: fanatical _________
quiz.explanation: 狂热的, 狂热的支持者. He was a fanatical supporter of his favorite football team. 他是他最喜欢的足球队的狂热支持者。

quiz.question: quizzical ____
quiz.explanation: 疑惑的, 疑惑的眼神. She gave him a quizzical look when he made the strange comment. 当他发表奇怪的评论时,她给了他一个疑惑的眼神。

quiz.question: ________ vandal
quiz.explanation: 破坏者, 无脑的破坏者. The mindless vandals destroyed public property for no reason. 无脑的破坏者无缘无故地破坏公共财产。

quiz.question: _______ ordeal
quiz.explanation: 折磨, 痛苦的折磨. The hostages endured a painful ordeal during their captivity. 人质在被囚禁期间忍受了痛苦的折磨。

quiz.question: _____ congeal
quiz.explanation: 凝结, 血液凝结. The cold temperature caused the blood to congeal on the surface. 寒冷的温度导致血液在表面凝结。

quiz.question: ____ peal __ _____
quiz.explanation: 响声, 响亮的钟声. A loud peal of church bells announced the wedding ceremony. 响亮的教堂钟声宣告了婚礼仪式。

quiz.question: corporeal ____
quiz.explanation: 肉体的, 肉体的身体. The philosophy debate focused on the nature of the corporeal body. 这场哲学辩论聚焦于肉体身体的本质。

quiz.question: ___ squeal
quiz.explanation: 尖叫, 猪尖叫. The pig let out a loud squeal when it was frightened. 猪受到惊吓时发出响亮的尖叫。

quiz.question: ______ weal
quiz.explanation: 福祉, 公共福祉. Politicians claimed to work for the common weal of all citizens. 政客们声称为所有公民的公共福祉工作。

quiz.question: _____ sundial
quiz.explanation: 日晷, 石制日晷. The ancient garden featured a weathered stone sundial. 这个古老的花园有一个风化的石制日晷。

quiz.question: _____ phial
quiz.explanation: 小瓶, 玻璃小瓶. The alchemist carefully poured liquid into a glass phial. 炼金术士小心地将液体倒入玻璃小瓶中。

quiz.question: pestilential _______
quiz.explanation: 瘟疫的, 瘟疫疾病. The pestilential disease spread rapidly through the medieval city. 瘟疫疾病在中世纪城市迅速传播。

quiz.question: torrential ____
quiz.explanation: 倾盆的, 倾盆大雨. Torrential rain caused severe flooding in the valley. 倾盆大雨导致山谷严重洪水。

quiz.question: ________ vial
quiz.explanation: 小瓶, 药品小瓶. The nurse prepared a medicine vial for the injection. 护士准备了一个药品小瓶用于注射。

quiz.question: jovial ____
quiz.explanation: 快活的, 快活的心情. The party host maintained a jovial mood throughout the evening. 派对主人整晚保持快活的心情。

quiz.question: ______ jackal
quiz.explanation: 豺狼, 沙漠豺狼. The desert jackal prowled the sand dunes at night. 沙漠豺狼在夜间在沙丘上游荡。

quiz.question: infinitesimal ______
quiz.explanation: 极小的, 极小的数量. Only an infinitesimal amount of the substance was needed. 只需要极小数量的这种物质。

quiz.question: subnormal _____
quiz.explanation: 低于正常的, 低于正常的儿童. Special education programs supported subnormal children with learning difficulties. 特殊教育项目支持有学习困难的低于正常水平的儿童。

quiz.question: dismal _______
quiz.explanation: 阴沉的, 阴沉的天气. The dismal weather dampened everyone's spirits at the picnic. 阴沉的天气使野餐时每个人的情绪都很低落。

quiz.question: abysmal _______
quiz.explanation: 糟糕透顶的, 糟糕透顶的失败. The project was an abysmal failure that cost the company millions. 这个项目是糟糕透顶的失败,让公司损失了数百万。

quiz.question: phenomenal _______
quiz.explanation: 非凡的, 非凡的成功. The debut album achieved phenomenal success beyond all expectations. 首张专辑取得了超出所有预期的非凡成功。

quiz.question: delusional ______
quiz.explanation: 妄想的, 妄想的信念. The patient suffered from delusional beliefs about being persecuted. 患者患有关于被迫害的妄想信念。

quiz.question: sensational ____
quiz.explanation: 轰动的, 轰动的新闻. The newspaper published sensational news to boost circulation. 报纸发布轰动的新闻来提高发行量。

quiz.question: impersonal ____
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的, 冷淡的语气. The official letter was written in an impersonal tone. 这封正式信件以冷淡的语气写成。

quiz.question: infernal _____
quiz.explanation: 讨厌的, 讨厌的噪音. The infernal noise from construction kept everyone awake. 来自施工的讨厌噪音让每个人都无法入睡。

quiz.question: paternal ____
quiz.explanation: 父亲的, 父亲的爱. His paternal love for his children was evident in everything he did. 他对孩子们的父爱在他所做的一切中都显而易见。

quiz.question: _____ foal
quiz.explanation: 小马驹, 马小马驹. The newborn horse foal struggled to stand on wobbly legs. 新生的马小马驹挣扎着用摇晃的腿站立。

quiz.question: appal ________
quiz.explanation: 使惊骇, 使观众惊骇. The graphic images would appal even the most hardened audience. 这些生动的图像会使最坚强的观众都感到惊骇。

quiz.question: sepulchral _____
quiz.explanation: 阴森的, 阴森的声音. The ghost spoke in a sepulchral voice that chilled their blood. 鬼魂用阴森的声音说话,让他们不寒而栗。

quiz.question: enthral _______
quiz.explanation: 迷住, 迷住读者. The author's vivid storytelling would enthral readers for hours. 作者生动的讲故事方式会让读者着迷数小时。

quiz.question: _______ perusal
quiz.explanation: 细读, 仔细细读. The contract required careful perusal before signing. 合同在签署前需要仔细细读。

quiz.question: _____ recital
quiz.explanation: 独奏会, 钢琴独奏会. The talented student gave a brilliant piano recital. 这位才华横溢的学生举办了一场精彩的钢琴独奏会。

quiz.question: temperamental ______
quiz.explanation: 喜怒无常的, 喜怒无常的艺术家. The temperamental artist refused to work under criticism. 这位喜怒无常的艺术家拒绝在批评下工作。

quiz.question: noncommittal ______
quiz.explanation: 不表态的, 不表态的回答. The politician gave a noncommittal answer to the controversial question. 这位政客对有争议的问题给出了不表态的回答。

quiz.question: asphodel ______
quiz.explanation: 水仙, 水仙花. In Greek mythology, asphodel flowers grew in the underworld. 在希腊神话中,水仙花生长在冥界。

quiz.question: cartwheel ____
quiz.explanation: 侧手翻, 侧手翻动作. The gymnast executed a perfect cartwheel move across the mat. 体操运动员在垫子上完美地执行了侧手翻动作。

quiz.question: ____ keel
quiz.explanation: 龙骨, 船龙骨. The ship's keel was damaged when it struck the reef. 船在撞击礁石时龙骨受损。

quiz.question: kneel ____
quiz.explanation: 跪下, 跪下. The knight would kneel down before his king in respect. 骑士会恭敬地在国王面前跪下。

quiz.question: pummel ________
quiz.explanation: 连续猛击, 连续猛击对手. The boxer continued to pummel his opponent with powerful punches. 拳击手继续用有力的拳头连续猛击对手。

quiz.question: ______ flannel
quiz.explanation: 法兰绒, 棉法兰绒. The soft cotton flannel shirt was perfect for cold weather. 柔软的棉法兰绒衬衫非常适合寒冷的天气。

quiz.question: repel ______
quiz.explanation: 击退, 击退进攻. The defenders managed to repel the enemy attack successfully. 防御者成功击退了敌人的进攻。

quiz.question: _____ scalpel
quiz.explanation: 手术刀, 锋利的手术刀. The surgeon used a sharp scalpel to make the precise incision. 外科医生用锋利的手术刀做出精确的切口。

quiz.question: propel _______
quiz.explanation: 推进, 推进向前. The strong wind helped propel the sailboat forward across the water. 强风帮助帆船在水面上推进向前。

quiz.question: dispel ______
quiz.explanation: 消除, 消除疑虑. The evidence helped dispel all doubts about his innocence. 证据帮助消除了对他清白的所有疑虑。

quiz.question: mongrel ___
quiz.explanation: 杂种狗, 杂种狗. The friendly mongrel dog was a mix of several breeds. 这只友好的杂种狗是几个品种的混合。

quiz.question: ____ wastrel
quiz.explanation: 浪荡子, 懒惰的浪荡子. The lazy wastrel squandered his family fortune on gambling. 这个懒惰的浪荡子把家族财产挥霍在赌博上。

quiz.question: ______ weasel
quiz.explanation: 黄鼠狼, 狡猾的黄鼠狼. The sneaky weasel crept silently through the chicken coop. 狡猾的黄鼠狼悄悄地爬过鸡舍。

quiz.question: _____ chisel
quiz.explanation: 凿子, 石凿子. The sculptor used a stone chisel to carve the marble statue. 雕塑家用石凿子雕刻大理石雕像。

quiz.question: _________ tinsel
quiz.explanation: 金属丝, 圣诞金属丝. Shiny Christmas tinsel decorated the festive tree. 闪亮的圣诞金属丝装饰着节日树。

quiz.question: ____ morsel
quiz.explanation: 一小口, 小小的一口. She ate only a tiny morsel of the rich dessert. 她只吃了一小口浓郁的甜点。

quiz.question: _____-__-_____ carousel
quiz.explanation: 旋转木马, 旋转木马. Children laughed as they rode the colorful merry-go-round carousel. 孩子们骑着彩色的旋转木马时笑了。

quiz.question: ____ lintel
quiz.explanation: 过梁, 门过梁. The ancient stone door lintel bore carved inscriptions. 古老的石制门过梁上有雕刻的铭文。

quiz.question: _____ ______ navel
quiz.explanation: 肚脐, 肚脐眼. The baby's belly button navel healed nicely after birth. 婴儿的肚脐眼在出生后愈合得很好。

quiz.question: unravel _______
quiz.explanation: 解开, 解开谜团. The detective worked tirelessly to unravel the mystery. 侦探不知疲倦地工作以解开谜团。

quiz.question: disheveled ____
quiz.explanation: 凌乱的, 凌乱的头发. She emerged from bed with wild disheveled hair. 她从床上起来时头发凌乱不堪。

quiz.question: multilevel ________
quiz.explanation: 多层的, 多层建筑. The shopping center was housed in a modern multilevel building. 购物中心坐落在一座现代化的多层建筑中。

quiz.question: snivel _____
quiz.explanation: 哭哭啼啼, 哭哭啼啼的孩子. The sniveling child complained about everything. 哭哭啼啼的孩子抱怨每件事。

quiz.question: shrivel __
quiz.explanation: 枯萎, 枯萎. The plants began to shrivel up in the intense heat. 植物在酷热中开始枯萎。

quiz.question: _____ hovel
quiz.explanation: 茅屋, 肮脏的茅屋. The poor family lived in a dirty hovel on the outskirts of town. 这个贫穷的家庭住在城镇郊区的肮脏茅屋里。

quiz.question: shovel ____
quiz.explanation: 铲, 铲雪. He had to shovel snow from the driveway every morning. 他每天早上都要从车道上铲雪。
